plot: A young woman living in a repressive dystopian society faces a difficult choice whether to give birth and raise a child in the crumbling world around her or risk her health and freedom for a dangerous illegal procedure.
title: Bind
plot_es: A young woman living in a repressive dystopian society faces a difficult choice whether to give birth and raise a child in the crumbling world around her or risk her health and freedom for a dangerous illegal procedure.
plot_en: A young woman living in a repressive dystopian society faces a difficult choice whether to give birth and raise a child in the crumbling world around her or risk her health and freedom for a dangerous illegal procedure.
